SELECT IFNULL(r.start_time,'')`start`, IFNULL(r.end_time,'')`end`, IFNULL(con.contract_id,'')id, IFNULL( l.`name`, '' ) `name`, IFNULL( o.door, '' ) door, IFNULL( con.state, '' ) state, IFNULL( r.pay_time, '' ) time, IFNULL( r.price, '' ) price, IFNULL( ord.paid_in_date, '' ) `date`, IFNULL( ord.paid_in_price, '' ) paidPrice, IFNULL( ord.remark, '' ) ramark, IFNULL( ord.invoice, '' ) invoice FROM t_contract con LEFT JOIN t_lessee l ON l.id = con.lessee_id LEFT JOIN t_rule r ON r.id = con.rule_id LEFT JOIN t_user_to_office uto ON uto.user_id = l.user_id LEFT JOIN t_office o ON o.id = uto.ofiice_id LEFT JOIN t_order ord ON ord.contract_id=con.contract_id WHERE 1=1
AND con.contract_id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_attention a LEFT JOIN t_office o ON a.attention_label = o.id LEFT JOIN t_contract c ON c.room=o.id WHERE a.attention_user = #{id} AND a.attention_type = 'C' AND c.state='A' AND DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY ) <= DATE( c.time );

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_attention a LEFT JOIN t_office o ON a.attention_label = o.id LEFT JOIN t_contract c ON c.room=o.id WHERE a.attention_type = 'C' AND a.attention_user = #{id} AND c.state='A' AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format(now(), '%Y%m'), date_format(c.time, '%Y%m') ) = #{month};
